verses.verse: When <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> you into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you go <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, and has cast <S%H5394><s%> out many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and the Girgashites, <S%H1622><s%> and the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites, <S%H6522><s%> and the Hivites, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusites, <S%H2983><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H7227><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than you;

And when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> you; you shall smite <S%H5221><s%> them, and utterly destroy <S%H2763><s%> them; you shall make <S%H3772><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them, nor <S%H3808><s%> show mercy <S%H2603><s%> to them:

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you make marriages <S%H2859><s%> with them; your daughter <S%H1323><s%> you shall not give <S%H5414><s%> to his son, <S%H1121><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> shall you take <S%H3947><s%> to your son. <S%H1121><s%>

For they will turn <S%H5493><s%> away your son <S%H1121><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> me, that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods: <S%H430><s%> so will the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you, and destroy <S%H8045><s%> you suddenly. <S%H4118><s%>

But thus <S%H3541><s%> shall you deal <S%H6213><s%> with them; you shall destroy <S%H5422><s%> their altars, <S%H4196><s%> and break <S%H7665><s%> down their images, <S%H4676><s%> and cut <S%H1438><s%> down their groves, <S%H842><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> their graven <S%H6456><s%> images with fire. <S%H784><s%>

For you are an holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> you to be a special <S%H5459><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to himself, above all <S%H3605><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> that are on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> did not set his love <S%H2836><s%> on you, nor <S%H3808><s%> choose <S%H977><s%> you, because you were more <S%H7230><s%> in number than any <S%H3605><s%> people; <S%H5971><s%> for you were the fewest <S%H4592><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%>

But because <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> loved <S%H160><s%> you, and because he would keep <S%H8104><s%> the oath <S%H7621><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had sworn <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers, <S%H1><s%> has the LORD <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you out with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and redeemed <S%H6299><s%> you out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of slaves, <S%H5650><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> he is God, <S%H430><s%> the faithful <S%H539><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> which <S%H834><s%> keeps <S%H8104><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and mercy <S%H2617><s%> with them that love <S%H157><s%> him and keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> to a thousand <S%H505><s%> generations; <S%H1755><s%>

And repays <S%H7999><s%> them that hate <S%H8130><s%> him to their face, <S%H6440><s%> to destroy <S%H6><s%> them: he will not be slack <S%H309><s%> to him that hates <S%H8130><s%> him, he will repay <S%H7999><s%> him to his face. <S%H6440><s%>

You shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and the statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and the judgments, <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> them.

Why it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, if <S%H6118><s%> you listen <S%H8085><s%> to these <S%H428><s%> judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and keep, <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them, that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall keep <S%H8104><s%> to you the covenant <S%H1285><s%> and the mercy <S%H2617><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers: <S%H1><s%>

And he will love <S%H157><s%> you, and bless <S%H1288><s%> you, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> you: he will also bless <S%H1288><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your womb, <S%H990><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your land, <S%H127><s%> your corn, <S%H1715><s%> and your wine, <S%H8492><s%> and your oil, <S%H3323><s%> the increase <S%H7698><s%> of your cows, <S%H504><s%> and the flocks <S%H6251><s%> of your sheep, <S%H6629><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> you.
You shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%> above all <S%H3605><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%> there shall not be male or female barren <S%H6135><s%> among you, or among your cattle. <S%H929><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will take <S%H5493><s%> away from you all <S%H3605><s%> sickness, <S%H2483><s%> and will put <S%H7760><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> of the evil <S%H7451><s%> diseases <S%H4064><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you know, <S%H3045><s%> on you; but will lay <S%H5414><s%> them on all <S%H3605><s%> them that hate <S%H8130><s%> you.

And you shall consume <S%H398><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> you; your eye <S%H5869><s%> shall have no <S%H3808><s%> pity <S%H2347><s%> on them: neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you serve <S%H5647><s%> their gods; <S%H430><s%> for that will be a snare <S%H4170><s%> to you.

If <S%H3588><s%> you shall say <S%H559><s%> in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> These <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> are more <S%H7227><s%> than I; how <S%H349><s%> can <S%H3201><s%> I dispossess <S%H3423><s%> them?

You shall not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of them: but shall well remember <S%H2142><s%> what <S%H853><s%> <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> Egypt; <S%H4714><s%>

The great <S%H1419><s%> temptations <S%H4531><s%> which <S%H834><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> saw, <S%H7200><s%> and the signs, <S%H226><s%> and the wonders, <S%H4159><s%> and the mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and the stretched <S%H5186><s%> out arm, <S%H2220><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you out: so <S%H3651><s%> shall the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you are afraid. <S%H3373><s%>

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will send <S%H7971><s%> the hornet <S%H6880><s%> among them, until <S%H5704><s%> they that are left, <S%H7604><s%> and hide <S%H5641><s%> themselves from you, be destroyed. <S%H6><s%>

You shall not be affrighted <S%H6206><s%> at <S%H6440><s%> them: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is among <S%H7130><s%> you, a mighty <S%H1419><s%> God <S%H410><s%> and terrible. <S%H3372><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will put <S%H5394><s%> out those <S%H411><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you by little <S%H4592><s%> and little: <S%H4592><s%> you may <S%H3201><s%> not consume <S%H3615><s%> them at <S%H4118><s%> once, <S%H4118><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> increase <S%H7235><s%> on you.

But the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> them to you, and shall destroy <S%H2000><s%> them with a mighty <S%H1419><s%> destruction, <S%H4103><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they be destroyed. <S%H8045><s%>

And he shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> their kings <S%H4428><s%> into your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and you shall destroy <S%H6><s%> their name <S%H8034><s%> from under <S%H8478><s%> heaven: <S%H8064><s%> there shall no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H375><s%> be able <S%H3320><s%> to stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, until <S%H5704><s%> you have destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them.

The graven <S%H6456><s%> images of their gods <S%H430><s%> shall you burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire: <S%H784><s%> you shall not desire <S%H2530><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> or gold <S%H2091><s%> that is on <S%H5921><s%> them, nor take <S%H3947><s%> it to you, lest <S%H6435><s%> you be snared <S%H3369><s%> therein: for it is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you bring <S%H935><s%> an abomination <S%H8441><s%> into <S%H413><s%> your house, <S%H1004><s%> lest you be a cursed <S%H2764><s%> thing like <S%H3644><s%> it: but you shall utterly detest <S%H8262><s%> it, and you shall utterly abhor <S%H8581><s%> it; for it is a cursed <S%H2764><s%> thing.
